COMPANY_INPUT_TERMS: You must not upload any personal data (i.e. any information from which a living person can be identified) into the tool.
In addition, you must not upload any client-related information.
To ensure that the above rules are being followed, all input submitted into the tool is logged on an internal database that is accessible and monitored by the TS AI team.
COMPANY_OUTPUT_TERMS: The answers provided by this tool should not be relied upon.  Output may be factually incorrect and, potentially, made up (i.e. the tool may "hallucinate" answers).
In addition, the tool has only been trained on data available up to 2021.  It may not, therefore, be capable of providing you with up-to-date, factually accurate information.
Taking the above into account, this tool should not be used for directly advising clients.
You are responsible for checking and validating all output.
